content.name: Tamagotchi
content.description: With this creation you will be able to add a working tamagotchi game to your world with just a few clicks.
content.metadescription: With this creation you will be able to add a working tamagotchi game to your world with just a few clicks.
content.command:
summon falling_block ~ ~.55 ~ {Time:1,Block:observer,Passengers:[{id:falling_block,Block:activator_rail,Time:1},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:setworldspawn ~ ~ ~},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~2 ~5 ~3 ~-1 ~-2 ~14 stained_hardened_clay 15},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~1 ~4 ~3 ~ ~-1 ~14 stained_glass},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~2 ~4 ~4 ~-1 ~-1 ~13 stained_glass},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~2 ~3 ~3 ~-1 ~ ~14 stained_glass},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~2 ~2 ~3 ~-1 ~1 ~14 stained_hardened_clay 15},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~ ~1 ~3 ~1 ~2 ~3 stained_hardened_clay 9},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:fill ~1 ~2 ~2 ~ ~1 ~2 wall_sign},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~1 ~2 ~2 {Text2:"{\"text\":\"Tamagotchi\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"playsound ui.button.click voice @p ~ ~ ~ 1 1.4\"},\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_blue\"}",Text3:"{\"text\":\"by: CommandJam\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"tellraw @p {\\\"text\\\":\\\"Subscribe to my §7You§cTube §rchannel! §b[Link]\\\",\\\"clickEvent\\\":{\\\"action\\\":\\\"open_url\\\",\\\"value\\\":\\\"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC32WcS2HGZ7AhPgTTIsPrkQ?sub_confirmation=1\\\"}}\"}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~ ~2 ~2 {Text1:"{\"text\":\"\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"playsound entity.firework.blast voice @p ~ ~ ~ 1 1.4\"}}",Text2:"{\"text\":\"Delete\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"kill @e[type=armor_stand,r=2]\"},\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_red\"}",Text3:"{\"text\":\"Right click!\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"fill ~-1 ~-4 ~ ~2 ~3 ~12 air\"}}",Text4:"{\"text\":\"\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"particle endRod ~ ~ ~6 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.7 100\"}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~ ~1 ~2 {Text1:"{\"text\":\"\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"playsound ui.button.click voice @p ~ ~ ~ 1 1.4\"}}",Text2:"{\"text\":\"Start\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"fill ~1 ~1 ~1 ~ ~ ~1 stained_hardened_clay 5\"},\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"green\"}",Text3:"{\"text\":\"Right click!\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"say Drop an egg together with 30 redstones onto the ground to make your tamagotchi! Set the chat size to 107 x 95 pixels! (Very important!)\"}}",Text4:"{\"text\":\"\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"blockdata ~ ~-2 ~2 {auto:1}\"}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:"blockdata ~1 ~1 ~2 {Text1:"{\"text\":\"\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"playsound ui.button.click voice @p ~ ~ ~ 1 1.4\"}}",Text2:"{\"text\":\"Stop\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"fill ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~ ~ ~1 stained_hardened_clay 9\"},\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}",Text3:"{\"text\":\"Right click!\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"blockdata ~-1 ~-2 ~2 {auto:0}\"}}"}"},{id:commandblock_minecart,Command:tellraw @a [{"text":"

§7 > Have a good time! :D
